Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Affords certain police/fire members who are members of the fire department pension fund to continue in service past normal retirement age with an additional pension benefit for each year of additional service
Summary: Affords certain police/fire members who are members of the fire department pension fund to continue in service past normal retirement age with an additional pension benefit for each year of additional service; provides an additional amount computed at the rate of one-fortieth of his or her final salary for each year of such additional service.
LawCode: Add ยง503-a, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to affording certain police/fire members who are members of the fire department pension fund to continue in service past normal retirement age with an additional pension benefit for each year of additional service
